content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cafd390a-6eba-4c8b-8566-c98db2197530/image2019-6-11_12-49-31.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":763,\"height\":430}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are welcome to explore the variety of EPAM applications and tools that help us deliver, grow, and connect with our teammates. We will gradually transition you to the key reporting tools when the data about your clients and projects will be migrated to EPAM tools.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Global Menu\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Global Menu is a quick search of EPAM's internal systems. Global Menu connects all applications in the EPAM ecosystem and helps users find projects, employees, or applications. You do not need to go back and forth between a many different sites or figure out where to find the information you need: Global Menu lets you find what you need in one place in just seconds.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
